DOC.brief_summary: This study aim verify effect segmental stabilization exercise program anticipatory postural adjustment subject chronic lumbar pain . The effect assess mean superficial electromyography focus registry onset multifidius deltoid ( anterior posterior ) activity repetitive shoulder ﬂexion/extension .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Segmental Stabilization Anticipatory Postural Adjustment Subjects With Lumbar Pain
DOC.criteria: woman age 18 65 year old chronic lumbar pain ( least 3 month ) average pain intensity ≥3 10point scale presence red flag ( i.e. , tumor , know fracture , diagnose inflammatory joint disease , etc ) ; history back surgery pregnancy le 3 month therapeutic treatment ( physiotherapy ) low back pain
